verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kahe,--'iṅhāra prauḍha yauvana
kemate sannyāsa-dharma ha-ibe rakṣaṇa

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya kahe—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya replied; iṅhāra—His; prauḍha—full; yauvana—youth; kemate—how; sannyāsa-dharma—principles of a sannyāsī; ha-ibe—there will be; rakṣaṇa—protection.
translation: The Bhaṭṭācārya inquired, "Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu is in His full-fledged youthful life. How can He keep the principles of sannyāsa?
